title: Patch Notes
body: Does Anyone know when the new patch notes are supposed to be out?

replies.body: They are usually dropped within 12 hours of the update.  Give or take.
do you know when the update is supposed to come out?

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=AzdAmfg3,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-13T18:54:41.312+0000)
>
> do you know when the update is supposed to come out?

"On January 14th  at 3:00 AM PST for NA, 5:00 GMT for EUW and 02:30 GMT for EUNE, servers will go down for maintenance and the  5.1 server patch will be applied."

Comes with Alistar update :>
